summary: Frontend testing for Batch 11 'Zero Loaders' performance refactoring - verified (tabs)/profile.tsx, profile/[id]/badges.tsx. FIXED: 1 critical bug - null pointer error when accessing profile.og_meta properties. All pages render instantly without page-level loading indicators.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: profile/[id]/badges.tsx - Added null check for profile before accessing og_meta properties (lines 155-163). Previously would crash when profile is null (fallbackData).
FIXED: Added placeholder UI state for when profile is null but no error (cache-first pattern waiting for data)
Cache-first pattern correctly implemented using useCacheFirst hook in both profile.tsx and badges.tsx
MyBadgesSection component in profile.tsx correctly uses useCacheFirst for badges data

bug_fixes.issue: Null pointer error - accessing profile.og_meta.title when profile is null
bug_fixes.fix: Added null check (!profile) early return with placeholder UI, and added optional chaining (?.) for og_meta properties in Head component

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 188 verified Batch 11 of 'Zero Loaders' performance refactoring: /(tabs)/profile, /profile/badges, /profile/[id]/badges. Fixed 1 critical bug - null pointer error when accessing profile.og_meta properties in badges.tsx (added early return for null profile). All pages render instantly without generic loading indicators. MyBadgesSection component uses useCacheFirst hook. Previous batch pages (profile/edit, profile/notifications, credits) continue to work correctly. The /boost route shows 'Unmatched Route' but boost functionality is accessible via /credits page.
